participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I enjoy cooking my favorite Asian food with my son. i love the game halo. i own a german shepard. i can t get enough of rap music , it s so good. i like to make fresh pies.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Reflective and down-to-earth, values simplicity and creativity in life.
participant_2.background: I'm not too concerned with my appearance. I have a busy life, but I manage to keep my priorities straight. I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast. i like to think about what it would be like to be an artist. I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest.

content.text: hi there !
hi ! how is your day going ?
good ! how is yours ?
so far so good ! i'm thinking about what to make for dinner
oh nice ! i love cooking , it is one of my favorite hobbies
me too ! i like to make fresh pies
i love that ! what type of pies do you like to make ?
i like to make apple , pumpkin and blueberry pies , but i also like to make fruit pies
oh nice ! i like apple pie , but i have never made a pumpkin pie before
you should give it a try ! they are really easy to make
i might try that ! what is your favorite type of music ?
i like rap music , it is so good
me too ! i love listening to rap music , it gets me pumped up
it does ! it is the perfect music to listen to when you are working out or cleaning
i agree ! it is also good to listen to when you are driving
yes ! it is the perfect music to listen to when you are driving
i am glad we have so much in common !
me too ! i think we would be good friends
i agree ! we should get together sometime and make a pie
that sounds like a great idea ! i would love to make a pie with yo
